title: Customized Social Studies Curriculum Design Based on Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Theories and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Students possess diverse learning styles, requiring personalized material delivery; learning effectiveness is measured through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Identification of preferred learning styles with over 80% accuracy using a learning style diagnostic tool
Explanation of core social studies concepts with over 90% comprehension using customized learning materials
Submission of peer-feedback-reflected project outcomes to achieve a learning satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 or higher
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
